column4: hello, I have installed eclipse (downloaded package and extracted to /usr/local/eclipse) but I want to add eclipse to my path so that I can type eclipse in a terminal and it launch. I tried using ln but that didnt work as it cant find library
what do I need to do?
btw, I need version 3.4 so I'm not using apt-get install
put a file in /usr/local/bin with the line that runs eclipse. Name it as the command you would like to have for eclipse, for example "eclipse". chmod +x it, and just run from terminal with "console"
